title: Polarization framing examples (reported)
summary: Summit IO records reported framing that polarizes U.S. discourse around the Venezuela event, with narratives shifting between legitimizing intervention and illegal-kidnapping claims.
findings: Narrative framing includes alternating claims to polarize domestic U.S. discourse about legitimacy and legality of the capture.
Summit IO classification hooks will map these frames into standardized stance tags.
limitations: Frame taxonomy alignment is Deferred pending classifier schema review.
